ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>Good use of context but could be more natural. Short note on improving flow and tone.<baseline_no_context<TAB>2<TAB>1<TAB>3<TAB>2<TAB>Lacks persona consistency, too direct; short note: Add suspicion subtly.

ratings.overall_quality: 5#The Gatekeeper's suspicion and strictness are well conveyed through the questioning tone. The natural language is appropriate for an NPC of this persona, maintaining a high level of quality in dialogue consistency.
